generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with a cobblestone texture, curving to the right, and bordered by curbs and parked cars.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the edge of the road, separated by a curb, and running parallel to the parked cars on the right side.
- building: A white building with a brown roof and blue trim is visible in the background, along with a larger brick building further back.
- vegetation: Several trees and green bushes are visible, including one large tree in front of the white building and others lining the road and background.
- terrain: A grassy slope is visible on the left side of the road, indicating a natural, vegetated area.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing clear and blue.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the road, including a black car and a gray car.
- pole: A pole with a parking sign is visible on the right side of the road, near the parked cars.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign with a white "P" is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- person: A person is visible standing near the parked cars on the right side of the road, partially obscured by the vehicles.
